1925.commonScript: var resizeObserver; var mutationObserver; var windowWidth; var elementprevTop; var elementprevLeft; var positionCheckintervalID; var windowHeigth; var rePositionLayoutRef = this.rePositionLayout.bind(this); var backdrop_boxes = ["elementbox", "topbox", "bottombox", "rightbox", "leftbox"]; this.calculateWindowDimension(); window.addEventListener("resize", this.rePositionLayout); window.addEventListener("wheel", this.rePositionLayout); function drawBackdrop() { var layoutContainer = document.querySelector('walkthrough-builder').shadowRoot.querySelector("[id^='layoutContainer'"); var cssId = layoutContainer.getAttribute('targetelementID'); var element = document.querySelector(cssId); var cssId = this.cssId; var element = element || document.querySelector(cssId); var targetElementWidth = element.getBoundingClientRect().width; var targetElementHeight = element.getBoundingClientRect().height; var targetElementTop = element.getBoundingClientRect().top; var targetElementLeft = element.getBoundingClientRect().left; var targetElementRight = element.getBoundingClientRect().right; var targetElementBottom = element.getBoundingClientRect().bottom; var self = this; function drawelementbox(backdropElement) { backdropElement.style.top = targetElementTop + 'px'; backdropElement.style.left = targetElementLeft + 'px'; backdropElement.style.height = targetElementHeight + 'px'; backdropElement.style.width = targetElementWidth + 'px'; }; function drawleftbox(backdropElement) { backdropElement.style.top = 0; backdropElement.style.left = 0; backdropElement.style.height = self.windowHeigth + 'px'; backdropElement.style.width = targetElementLeft + 'px'; }; function drawrightbox(backdropElement) { backdropElement.style.top = 0; backdropElement.style.right = 0; backdropElement.style.height = self.windowHeigth + 'px'; backdropElement.style.width = self.windowWidth - targetElementRight + 'px'; }; function drawbottombox(backdropElement) { backdropElement.style.top = targetElementTop + targetElementHeight + 'px'; backdropElement.style.left = targetElementLeft + 'px'; backdropElement.style.height = self.windowHeigth - targetElementBottom + 'px'; backdropElement.style.width = targetElementRight - targetElementLeft + 'px'; }; function drawtopbox(backdropElement) { backdropElement.style.top = 0; backdropElement.style.left = targetElementLeft + 'px'; backdropElement.style.height = targetElementTop > 0 ? targetElementTop + 'px' : '0px'; backdropElement.style.width = targetElementRight - targetElementLeft + 'px'; }; var backdropStyleFunctionMapping = { "leftbox": drawleftbox, "bottombox": drawbottombox, "rightbox": drawrightbox, "topbox": drawtopbox, "elementbox": drawelementbox }; for (var i = 0; i < this.backdrop_boxes.length; i++) { let classname = '.backdrop_root' + '> .' + backdrop_boxes[i]; var backdropElement = document.querySelector('walkthrough-builder').shadowRoot.querySelector(classname); backdropElement.style.display = 'block'; backdropStyleFunctionMapping[this.backdrop_boxes[i]](backdropElement); } }; function calculateWindowDimension() { var html = document.documentElement; this.windowHeigth = Math.max(document.body.scrollHeight, document.body.offsetHeight, html.clientHeight, html.scrollHeight, html.offsetHeight); var windowinnnerWidth = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.body.clientWidth; var scrollbarWidth = windowinnnerWidth - document.documentElement.clientWidth; this.windowWidth = windowinnnerWidth - scrollbarWidth; }; function findLayoutposition(){ var layoutContainer = document.querySelector('walkthrough-builder').shadowRoot.querySelector("[id^='layoutContainer'"); var cssId = layoutContainer.getAttribute('targetelementid'); var placement = layoutContainer.getAttribute('layout-alignment'); var layoutWidth = layoutContainer.getAttribute('width'); var element = document.querySelector(cssId); if (!element) return; var layoutTop; var layoutLeft; var elementTop = parseInt(element.getBoundingClientRect().top); var elementLeft = parseInt(element.getBoundingClientRect().left); var elementWidth = element.getBoundingClientRect().width; var elementHeight = element.getBoundingClientRect().height; var elementRight = element.getBoundingClientRect().right; var elementBottom = element.getBoundingClientRect().bottom; var layoutOffset = 20; var layoutHeight = layoutContainer.getBoundingClientRect().height; switch (placement) { case 'bottom-center': layoutTop = elementTop + elementHeight + layoutOffset; layoutLeft = elementRight - elementWidth / 2 - layoutWidth / 2; break; case 'bottom-right': layoutTop = elementTop + elementHeight + layoutOffset; layoutLeft = elementRight - layoutWidth; break; case 'bottom-left': layoutTop = elementTop + elementHeight + layoutOffset; layoutLeft = elementLeft; break; case 'left-top': layoutTop = elementTop; layoutLeft = elementLeft - layoutWidth - layoutOffset; break; case 'left-center': layoutTop = elementBottom - layoutHeight / 2 - elementHeight / 2; layoutLeft = elementLeft - layoutWidth - layoutOffset; break; case 'left-bottom': layoutTop = elementBottom - layoutHeight; layoutLeft = elementLeft - layoutWidth - layoutOffset; break; case 'top-center': layoutTop = elementTop - layoutHeight - layoutOffset; layoutLeft = elementRight - elementWidth / 2 - layoutWidth / 2; break; case 'top-right': layoutTop = elementTop - layoutHeight - layoutOffset; layoutLeft = elementRight - layoutWidth; break; case 'top-left': layoutTop = elementTop - layoutHeight - layoutOffset; layoutLeft = elementLeft; break; case 'right-top': layoutTop = elementTop; layoutLeft = elementRight + layoutOffset; break; case 'right-center': layoutTop = elementBottom - layoutHeight / 2 - elementHeight / 2; layoutLeft = elementRight + layoutOffset; break; case 'right-bottom': layoutTop = elementBottom - layoutHeight; layoutLeft = elementRight + layoutOffset; break; }; layoutContainer.style.top = layoutTop+"px"; layoutContainer.style.left = layoutLeft+"px"; }; function observeDOMElementChange(element) { if (this.mutationObserver || this.resizeObserver) { this.destroyEvents(); }; this.mutationObserver = new MutationObserver(() => { setTimeout(this.rePositionLayout, 10); }); this.mutationObserver.observe(element, { childList: true, subtree: true }); this.resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(() => { setTimeout(this.rePositionLayout, 10); }); this.resizeObserver.observe(element); window.clearInterval(this.positionCheckintervalID); var self = this; this.positionCheckintervalID = setInterval(()=>{ if (self.hasElementPositionChanged(element)) { self.rePositionLayout(); }; }, 500); }; function hasElementPositionChanged(element) { try { let elementCurrenttop = element.getBoundingClientRect().top; let elementCurrentleft = element.getBoundingClientRect().left; if (this.elementprevTop === elementCurrenttop && this.elementprevleft === elementCurrentleft) { return false; }; this.elementprevTop = element.getBoundingClientRect().top; this.elementprevleft = element.getBoundingClientRect().left; return true; } catch (err) { }; }; function destroyEvents() { try { this.mutationObserver.disconnect(); this.resizeObserver.disconnect(); window.clearInterval(this.positionCheckintervalID); } catch (error) {} this.resizeObserver = null; this.mutationObserver = null; }; function loadScript() { var layoutContainer = document.querySelector('walkthrough-builder').shadowRoot.querySelector("[id^='layoutContainer'"); var cssId = layoutContainer.getAttribute('targetelementID'); var element = document.querySelector(cssId); this.findLayoutposition(); this.drawBackdrop(); this.observeDOMElementChange(element); }; function rePositionLayout() { try { this.calculateWindowDimension(); this.findLayoutposition(); this.drawBackdrop(); } catch (error) { } };
